ARABIC: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِن تُطِيعُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يَرُدُّوكُمْ عَلَىٰٓ أَعْقَٰبِكُمْ فَتَنقَلِبُوا۟ خَٰسِرِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You who have iman! if you obey those who are kafir, they will turn you round on your heels and you will be transformed into losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: O believers, if you listen to the infidels they will make you turn your backs, and you will be the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Believers! If you follow those who deny the Truth, they will drive you back on your heels, and you will turn about, losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Believers, if you obey the unbelievers, they will turn you back to disbelief and you will become lost.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: O People who Believe! If you obey the disbelievers, they will make you turn back on your heels, so you will then turn back as losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: O you who believe! If you obey those who disbelieve, they will send you back on your heels, and you will turn back as losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: O you who believe! if you obey those who disbelieve they will turn you back upon your heels, so you will turn back losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: O believers, if you obey the unbelievers they will turn you upon your heels, and you will turn about, losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: O ye who believe! if ye obey those who disbelieve, they will make you turn back on your heels, and ye turn back as losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Believers, if you yield to those who deny the truth, they will cause you to turn back on your heels and you will turn into losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: O O Ye who believe! if ye obey those who disbelieve, they will send you back on your heels, and ye will turn back losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: O you who have faith! If you obey the faithless, they will turn you back on your heels, and you will become losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: O ye who believe! If ye obey the Unbelievers, they will drive you back on your heels, and ye will turn back (from Faith) to your own loss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: O you who believe! If you obey those who disbelieve, they will send you back on your heels, and you will turn back (from Faith) as losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Believers, if you obey those who disbelieve they will turn you upon your heels and you will turn to be losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: O you who believe! If you obey those who disbelieve, they will turn you back on your heels, and you end up losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: O you who have believed, if you obey those who disbelieve, they will turn you back on your heels, and you will [then] become losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [3:149] O you who believe, if you obey the disbelievers, in what they command you, they will make you turn back on your heels, [back] to unbelief, and you will revert as losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (0 ye who believe) meaning: Hudhayfa [Ibn al-Yaman] and 'Ammar [Ibn Yasir]! (If ye obey those who disbelieve) i.e. Ka'b [Ibn al-Ashraf] and his followers, (they will make you turn back on your heels) they will make you return to your old religion: disbelief, (and ye turn back as losers) duped for loosing both this worldly life and the Hereafter and also for receiving Allah's punishment.
